prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a serpentine body and soft blue scales.
I want a cute dragon-like creature that has a sleek design and white accents.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a gentle sea serpent with a calm demeanor.
Make a whimsical creature that glides through water with graceful movements.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful dragon, starting as a small aquatic form.
Design an adorable Pokemon that blends into its watery habitat with vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to play in lakes and is known for its friendly nature.
